description:
11.24 chromahold
Remove all color information for all colors except for certain one.

The filter accepts the following options:

blend.description: Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels either fully gray, or not gray at all. Higher values result in more preserved color.

color.description: The color which will not be replaced with neutral chroma.

similarity.description: Similarity percentage with the above color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

yuv.description: Signals that the color passed is already in YUV instead of RGB. Literal colors like 'green' or 'red' don't make sense with this enabled anymore. This can be used to pass exact YUV values as hexadecimal numbers.
